definitions.title: Pa.
definitions.body: c. acc. [[פִּשְׁרָא]] (or equiv.): Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[יְחַוִּנַּ֫נִי]] (sf. pers. Indir. obj.) Da 5:7, [[יְּחֵוִנֵּהּ]] Da 2:11 ([[קֳדָּם]] pers.); 1 s. [[אֲחַוֶה]] Da 2:24 ([[ל]] pers), 1 pl. [[אְחַוֶּה]] v:Da 2:4.

definitions.title: Haph.
definitions.body: usu. c. acc. [[פִשְׁרָא]] (or equiv.): Impf. 3 ms. [[יְהַחֲוֶה]] Da 5:12; 2 mpl. [[תְּהַחֲוֹן]] Da 2:6, sf. (of indir. obj.) [[תְחַחֲוֻ֫נַּנִי]] v:Da 2:9; 1 pl. [[נְהַחֲוֶה]] v:Da 2:7; Imv. mpl. sf. (of indir. obj.) [[הַחֲוָֹנִי]] v:Da 2:6; Inf. [[לְהַחֲוָיָה]] v:Da 2:10, Da 5:15; + [[ל]] pers. Da 2:16, Da 2:27; c. acc. of signs and wonders 3:32.
